channel.title: RuneVx - Clipped Everything, Object verifying, Combat from scratch Runesource
channel.description:
I'm iBailey from rune serba
100 + downloads
Hi.
Server is Azure based.
Features are;
Combat system decent i suppose Clipped Walking No more noclipping noobs Object verifying No more fake object noobs Most packets are verified ;) Clipped following, Follows last step. Clipped Projectiles. Other stuff
Media taken from project thread which is old note that the combat is now way more advanced and shit.
Video Archive [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xK8MzNylsio&feature=youtu.be]Basic combat - YouTube[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K5h381HJ1vc&feature=youtu.be]Pvm.mov - YouTube[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5jEEqU9Emwo&feature=youtu.be]Following - YouTube[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_Ie4cPMd1DU&feature=youtu.be]Npc, Walking, Following and Combat - YouTube[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hJR373uNoTY&feature=youtu.be]Pvm fixes - YouTube[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yv51e7dGGNw&feature=youtu.b]Magic System - YouTube[/url]
[center] Old video but ok.
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PyAGvPWOFAs&feature=youtu.be]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PyAGvPWOFAs&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]
Link: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?ha7vh637gb864n2]runevx release.zip[/url]
[/center] Credits: Ultimate (if your reading this i removed your clan chat, dialogue and all that ;)) Resolute (Being awesome) Mikey' (Combat Utils) BFMV (Base) Entity (Combat design, i used it as reference) Blakeman8192 (Runesource) Aleksandr (Clipped projectiles Method) Me
BYE.
[B][U]Don't forget to post Cuties![/U][/B]
